text: Borrowing Matchsticks (, ) is a 1980 Finnish Russian comedy movie directed by Leonid Gaidai based on the novel by Algot Untola. It stars Yevgeny Leonov, Ritva Valkama, Vyacheslav Nevinny, Georgy Vitsin, Rita Polster, and Sergey Filippov ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 comedy movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Leonid Gaidai Category:Movies set in Finland Category:Movies set in the 20th century
title: Borrowing Matchsticks
